titleStmt.title: SII 7.1024: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1024. (A.R. No. 392 of 1902). ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE ADIYAPPAN SHRINE AT KIL-KASAKUDI (FRENCH TERRITORY).

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
rājarājadevaṟku yāṇṭu pattāvatu meṣanāyaṟṟu Aparapakṣattu Aṣṭamiyum cevvāykkiḻamaiyum peṟṟa Aviṭṭattu nāḷ Uyyakkoṇṭārvaḷanāṭṭuk kuṟumpūrnāṭṭu brahmadeśam kāyākkuṭiyāṉa Udayacandraccaturvedimaṅ
ranārāyaṇapaṭṭaṉeṉ Ivvūṟ piṭākai cerakuṭṭanūr Uṭaiyār tiruvātiśvaramuṭaiya nāyanāṟku nāṉ tirunantāviḷakkuppuṟamāka kuṭutta kollaiyāvatu kuṇṭūr Āḷkoṇṭavillipaṭṭaṉpakkal muṉṉā
kaṭṭaḷaiyil tirunantāviḷakkuppuṟamākak kuṭuttataṟku kiḻpāṟkellai tūrppil muttanārāyaṇapaṭṭaṉ Uḷḷiṭṭār kollaikku meṟkum teṉpāṟkellai kaṭalāṭuperuvaḻikku vaṭakku melpāṟkellai tūṟpil I
laikkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai puṉceyvāykkālukku teṟkum Āka Icaitta perunāṉkellaiyuḷ naṭuvupaṭṭa Uḻavaṉaṭaippaṭi nilam 4� ciṉṉam Iṉṉilam nālumāc ciṉṉamum Uṭaiyār tiruvādiśvaramuṭaiyāṟkut tirunantāviḷa
ṇikkuṭutteṉ Iccaṅkaranārāyaṇapaṭṭaṉeṉ Ippaṭikku Ivai caṅkaranārāyaṇapaṭṭaṉ Eḻuttu Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ Iḻakkantiṟattu jātavedabhaṭṭaṉeṉ Ippaṭi yaṟiveṉ Uṟuppuṭṭur nirappiyaūraṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟive
toṉṟipaṭṭaṉeṉ Ippaṭi Aṟiveṉ kuṇṭur Iḷaiya tirunaḷḷāṟuUṭaiyāṉpaṭṭaṉeṉ .
Digital edition of SII 7.1024 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
